page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF CENTRAL LEEDS
page.content: THE CENTRE OF LEEDS IS COMPOSED OF SHOPS AND OFFICES. SOME OF THE SHOPPING AREAS ARE NEW UNDER COVER PRECINCTS LIKE THE ST JOHN'S CENTRE.OTHER SHOPPING AREAS ARE NOT UNDER COVER BUT ARE NOT OPEN TO CARS ETC. AROUND THE CENTRAL SHOPPING AREA IS AN OLDER ZONE OF HOUSING SOME OF WHICH HAS BEEN DONE UP BUT IN SOME AREAS THE OLDER HOUSES HAVE BEEN KNOCKED DOWN AND REPLACED BY TALL BLOCKS OF FLATS,OR OTHER NEW HOUSING. IN SOME AREAS THERE IS A CONCENTRATION OF INDUSTRY. THIS IS ESPECIALLY SO ALONG THE BANKS OF THE RIVER AIRE AND TO THE SOUTH OF THE CITY CENTRE. BY MRS GEORGAS CITY OF LEEDS SCHOOL.
